cast.overview: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.
cast.title: Shazam!

details.biography: A Swedish actress, scriptwriter, photographer, and jewelry maker. She studied theatre history and gender studies at Lund University and completed two years of the theatre acting program at Blekinge läns folkhögskola. She works together with her husband, David F. Sandberg, on scriptwriting and film making. Before her film debut in the 2013 horror short Cam Closer, she did a variety of stage acting and narration work.
details.name: Lotta Losten
